channel.title: CVE Feed for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mitsubishi Electric Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4088|2024-09-24T18:27:11.655Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- gx%20works3
item.description: Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in Mitsubishi Electric Corporation multiple FA engineering software products allows a malicious local attacker to execute a malicious code, resulting in information disclosure, tampering with and deletion, or a denial-of-service (DoS) condition, if the product is installed in a folder other than the default installation folder.

item.title: CVE-2024-1182|2024-08-19T15:25:49.496Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- genesis64
item.description: Uncontrolled Search Path Element vulnerability in ICONICS GENESIS64 all versions, Mitsubishi Electric GENESIS64 all versions and Mitsubishi Electric MC Works64 all versions allows a local attacker to execute a malicious code by storing a specially crafted DLL in a specific folder when GENESIS64 and MC Works64 are installed with the Pager agent in the alarm multi-agent notification feature.

item.title: CVE-2024-3904|2024-07-23T00:28:13.328Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- melipc%20series%20mi5122-vw
item.description: Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in Smart Device Communication Gateway preinstalled on MELIPC Series MI5122-VW firmware versions "05" to "07" allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code by saving a malicious file to a specific folder. As a result, the attacker may disclose, tamper with, destroy or delete information in the product, or cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition on the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-3904|2024-07-05T13:52:40.732Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- melipc%20series%20mi5122-vw
item.description: Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in Smart Device Communication Gateway preinstalled on MELIPC Series MI5122-VW firmware versions "05" to "07" allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code by saving a malicious file to a specific folder. As a result, the attacker may disclose, tamper with, destroy or delete information in the product, or cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition on the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-3904|2024-07-04T09:11:22.679Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- melipc%20series%20mi5122-vw
item.description: Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in Smart Device Communication Gateway preinstalled on MELIPC Series MI5122-VW firmware versions "05" to "07" allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code by saving a malicious file to a specific folder. As a result, the attacker may disclose, tamper with, destroy or delete information in the product, or cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition on the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-1182|2024-07-04T08:53:41.217Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- genesis64
item.description: Uncontrolled Search Path Element vulnerability in ICONICS GENESIS64 all versions, Mitsubishi Electric GENESIS64 all versions and Mitsubishi Electric MC Works64 all versions allows a local attacker to execute a malicious code by storing a specially crafted DLL in a specific folder when GENESIS64 and MC Works64 are installed with the Pager agent in the alarm multi-agent notification feature.

item.title: CVE-2024-1574|2024-07-04T09:02:35.260Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- genesis64
item.description: Use of Externally-Controlled Input to Select Classes or Code ('Unsafe Reflection') vulnerability in the licensing feature of ICONICS GENESIS64 versions 10.97 to 10.97.2, Mitsubishi Electric GENESIS64 versions 10.97 to 10.97.2 and Mitsubishi Electric MC Works64 all versions allows a local attacker to execute a malicious code with administrative privileges by tampering with a specific file that is not protected by the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-1573|2024-07-04T08:59:44.079Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- genesis64
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in the mobile monitoring feature of ICONICS GENESIS64 versions 10.97 to 10.97.2, Mitsubishi Electric GENESIS64 versions 10.97 to 10.97.2 and Mitsubishi Electric MC Works64 all versions allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass proper authentication and log in to the system when all of the following conditions are met: * Active Directory is used in the security setting. * “Automatic log in” option is enabled in the security setting. * The IcoAnyGlass IIS Application Pool is running under an Active Directory Domain Account. * The IcoAnyGlass IIS Application Pool account is included in GENESIS64TM and MC Works64 Security and has permission to log in.

item.title: CVE-2024-1574|2024-07-05T14:45:36.502Z -- mitsubishi%20electric%20corporation -- genesis64
item.description: Use of Externally-Controlled Input to Select Classes or Code ('Unsafe Reflection') vulnerability in the licensing feature of ICONICS GENESIS64 versions 10.97 to 10.97.2, Mitsubishi Electric GENESIS64 versions 10.97 to 10.97.2 and Mitsubishi Electric MC Works64 all versions allows a local attacker to execute a malicious code with administrative privileges by tampering with a specific file that is not protected by the system.

item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in the mobile monitoring feature of ICONICS GENESIS64 versions 10.97 to 10.97.2, Mitsubishi Electric GENESIS64 versions 10.97 to 10.97.2 and Mitsubishi Electric MC Works64 all versions allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to bypass proper authentication and log in to the system when all of the following conditions are met: * Active Directory is used in the security setting. * “Automatic log in” option is enabled in the security setting. * The IcoAnyGlass IIS Application Pool is running under an Active Directory Domain Account. * The IcoAnyGlass IIS Application Pool account is included in GENESIS64TM and MC Works64 Security and has permission to log in.
